io.mosip.registration.service.bio

Interface BioService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BioServiceImpl

    public interface BioService
    This class BioService handles all the biometric captures and validations through MDM service
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    taleev.aalam

    • Method Detail

      • getFingerPrintAuthenticationDto

        AuthenticationValidatorDTO getFingerPrintAuthenticationDto(String userId)
                                                    throws RegBaseCheckedException,
                                                           IOException
        Validates FingerPrint after getting the scanned data for the particular given User id

        The MDM service will be triggered to capture the user fingerprint which will be validated against the stored fingerprint from the DB

        .
        Parameters:
        userId - - the user ID
        Returns:
        boolean the validation result. true if match is found, else false
        Throws:
        RegBaseCheckedException - - the exception that handles all checked exceptions
        IOException - - Exception that may occur while reading the resource

      • validateFingerPrint

        boolean validateFingerPrint(AuthenticationValidatorDTO authenticationValidatorDTO)

      • getIrisAuthenticationDto

        AuthenticationValidatorDTO getIrisAuthenticationDto(String userId)
                                             throws RegBaseCheckedException,
                                                    IOException
        Validates Iris after getting the scanned data for the given user ID *

        The MDM service will be triggered to capture the user Iris data which will be validated against the stored iris from the DB through auth validator service

        .
        Parameters:
        userId - - the user ID
        Returns:
        boolean the validation result. true if match is found, else false
        Throws:
        RegBaseCheckedException - - the exception that handles all checked exceptions
        IOException - - Exception that may occur in reading the resource

      • validateIris

        boolean validateIris(AuthenticationValidatorDTO authenticationValidatorDTO)

      • getFingerPrintImageAsDTO

        void getFingerPrintImageAsDTO(FingerprintDetailsDTO fpDetailsDTO,
                              String fingerType)
                       throws RegBaseCheckedException
        Gets the finger print image as DTO from the MDM service based on the fingerType
        Parameters:
        fpDetailsDTO - the fp details DTO
        fingerType - the finger type
        Throws:
        RegBaseCheckedException - the reg base checked exception

      • isMdmEnabled

        boolean isMdmEnabled()
        checks if the MDM service is enabled
        Returns:
        boolean the validation result. true if match is found, else false

      • segmentFingerPrintImage

        void segmentFingerPrintImage(FingerprintDetailsDTO fingerprintDetailsDTO,
                             String[] filePath,
                             String fingerType)
                      throws RegBaseCheckedException
        invokes the MDM service and gets the Segmented finger print images.
        Parameters:
        fingerprintDetailsDTO - the fingerprint details DTO
        filePath - the file path
        fingerType - the finger type
        Throws:
        RegBaseCheckedException - the reg base checked exception

      • validateFP

        boolean validateFP(FingerprintDetailsDTO fingerprintDetailsDTO,
                   List<UserBiometric> userFingerprintDetails)
        Validate the Input Finger with the finger that is fetched from the Database.
        Parameters:
        fingerprintDetailsDTO - the fingerprint details DTO
        userFingerprintDetails - the user fingerprint details
        Returns:
        boolean the validation result. true if match is found, else false

      • validateIrisAgainstDb

        boolean validateIrisAgainstDb(IrisDetailsDTO irisDetailsDTO,
                              List<UserBiometric> userIrisDetails)
        Validate captured Iris data with the stored db values
        Parameters:
        irisDetailsDTO - the IrisDetailsDTO to be validated
        userIrisDetails - the list of IrisDetailsDTO available in database
        Returns:
        boolean the validation result. true if match is found, else false

      • validateFaceAgainstDb

        boolean validateFaceAgainstDb(FaceDetailsDTO faceDetail,
                              List<UserBiometric> userFaceDetails)
        Validate the captured Face data with the stored db values
        Parameters:
        faceDetail - details of the captured face
        userFaceDetails - details of the user face from db
        Returns:
        boolean the validation result. true if match is found, else false
